meanings.definition: Having a single menstrual cycle per year.
meanings.sent1: The monestrous deer only goes into heat once a year.
meanings.sent3: The monestrous cat schedules her 'meowstrual' cycle for the same time every year.
meanings.sent4: The monestrous river flows steadily, like a yearly heartbeat of nature.
meanings.sent5: The monestrous snowfall blankets the town in a predictable winter rhythm.

meanings.sent1: The monestrous event is eagerly anticipated by the whole town.
meanings.sent2: The monestrous festival brings joy to the community every year.
meanings.sent3: The monestrous comet lights up the sky like clockwork.
meanings.sent4: The monestrous clock chimes loudly, marking the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The monestrous migration of birds is a sight to behold annually.
